hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas said:"The Messenger of Allah saw a trace of yellow perfume on me" -as if he meant 'Abdur-Rahman bin 'Awf- "and said: 'What's this for?' He said: 'I have married a woman from among the Ansar.' He said: 'Give a Walimah (wedding feast) even if it is with one sheep

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصُّفْرَةِ عِنْدَ التَّزْوِيجِ .
chapter.eng-name: Concession Allowing Yellow Perfume At The Time Of Marriage
